name: Gripskids: Sachkunde
description:
www.engine-software.com - official developer's website (from Ad Blurbs)

GripsKids: Sachkunde (science) is a fun and challenging educative title aimed to amuse children and improve their knowledge and understanding of math. Whether it's abour gravity, organs in our body, or about the countries in the world, GripsKids has something to learn for everyone.
publishedBy: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG

releases.publisher: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG
